article_title: Searching for the Female Warren Buffett
article_text:
Women are still woefully underrepresented on company boards, in Congress and even in space.

But attendees of the inaugural Association for Corporate Growth New York Women of Leadership Summit, which met last week in New York, are attempting to narrow the gender gap in finance and entrepreneurship.
